net.centro.rtb.http

Class HttpConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.centro.rtb.http.HttpConnector

  • public class HttpConnector
extends Object
    Main http client class. Should be instantiated using the HttpConnectorBuilder class.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ofir Gal

      • getResponseBody

        public <T> T getResponseBody(Class<T> tClass)
        Returns the http response body.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Generic type
        Parameters:
        tClass - the type of object the response should be mapped to. (Ex. getResponseBody(String.class))
        Returns:
        Response body object as the generic parameter type.

      • isAsyncDone

        public boolean isAsyncDone()
        Checks if the async request received a response. (wrapper to a Future isDone() method)
        Returns:
        true if a response exists, false if a response has yet to be received.

      • getResponseBody

        public static <T> T getResponseBody(javax.ws.rs.core.Response response,
                                    Class<T> tClass)
        Static method to provide similar usability when implementing the InvocationCallBack interface.
        Type Parameters:
        T - generic type.
        Parameters:
        response - The javax.ws.rs.core.Response object returned in the onComplete(Response reponse)
        tClass - The type of object the response should transform to.
        Returns:
        a generic type object that represent the response.

      • geResponseTime

        public long geResponseTime()
        The time in milliseconds it took to invoke the request and get a response from the server.
        Returns:
        the time in Milliseconds it took to invoke the request and get a response from the server. Returns -1 if an async request hasn't received a response yet. This method will return the total time of invoking a request and getting the response from the server.

      • saveToFile

        public void saveToFile()
                throws IOException
        Save the file to the path set in the builder class.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • saveToFile

        public static void saveToFile(javax.ws.rs.core.Response response,
                              Path path)
                       throws IOException
        Saves the http response stream to a local file. Designed to be used by invocationCallback implementation.
        Parameters:
        path - a java.nio.file.Path
        Throws:
        IOException

        public String getResponseMessage()
        Returns:
